name: Clash of Greeks
description:
It is the war for the kingship of Gods! Play as the mighty Zeus challenging Cronus and his army of titans.  Clash of Greeks will be a 2D fast- paced arcade action game with a top down view.

  • Use the sling shot mechanics to destroy titans.
  • Pick up chests
  • Use items from the chest to upgrade powers and defense.

Game will have a slingshot- like mechanism, inspired by block breaker and space invaders with a mix of RPG elements. Each time the player successfully defeats a horde, he will be awarded with a chest which contains coins and diamonds which can be used for upgrading player’s powers. The more powerful player gets, the more powerful his defense can be.
